author: mmartinec
msg: poll_callback could have called set_response_packet or report_id_complete, notice the request completion right away

author: wrowe
msg: Declare that which is currently assigned in our httpd connection
creation logic, so that the two are much easier to compare.
(Note this is 95% identicial since null values == pcalloc() defaults,
but more intuitive for developers trying to follow the logic.)

author: rajith
msg: Added some debug logs to indicate credit levels and verify if a message is enqueued.
I found it useful during testing

author: wrowe
msg: Reduce the noise level in the log once a client 'goes away', there
is no need for this many reiterations of the same essential error.

author: rajith
msg: Fixed an error with the credit based flow control
